transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Ferocious Gladiator's Scaled Helm

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 814,788 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 317,737.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,634, further increased by 954 while you remain within its light.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
